name: ABRACA - Imagic Games
description: Imagi is the country where fairy tale characters live, with its bad guys and damsels in distress. So much so that becoming prince charming is a treacherous path where the gloves really come off! Two, three or four players all pretend to be princes who must survive a series of challenges!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Is a fun party game, but bit unbalanced, is has awesome graphics and cool characters ..
